timeline.bodyText:
Hi, thx for contributing and sorry for the belayed review, we were focused on 1.0.x release.
Why did we remove the parenthesis? Precedence is not that clear now.
timeline.author: manusa

replies.bodyText: Hi, it's a my IDE option that remove unecessary parenthesis. I can remove it if you want
replies.author: Danipiario

replies.bodyText: Hi, yes please, leave it as it was. Intention looks clearer, I reviewed this fairly early in the morning and it took a while to figure out what was happening.
replies.author: manusa

timeline.message:
Add parenthesis for better clarity

Signed-off-by: Danipiario <daniele.pirola@icteam.it>
